description: n^p-(n-1)^p, where p is the n-th prime.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,95
prog: for(n=1,20,print1(n^prime(n)-(n-1)^prime(n)","))(PARI) { n=0; forprime (p=2, prime(95), write("b061028.txt", n++, " ", n^p - (n - 1)^p); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 17 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), May 25 2001
extensions: OFFSET changed from 0,2 to 1,2 by _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 17 2009
